Our Story, Rooted in Manang

A legacy of land, family, and sustainable hospitality.

The Farmhouse & The Orchard

Our story began generations ago with the first apple saplings planted in the rich soil of Bhratang, Manang. What started as a family homestead has gently evolved into a serene agro-tourism retreat, always holding true to its roots.

We believe in the slow rhythm of mountain life—the bloom of the orchard in spring, the harvest in autumn, and the quiet introspection of winter. Every stone of the farmhouse and every branch in the orchard tells a part of our history.

"We don't just host guests; we welcome them into the ongoing story of this land."
Historic Photo of the Farmhouse

Our Agro-Tourism Focus

Harmony with Nature

We practice sustainable farming, nurture our heritage apple varieties, and minimize our footprint to protect the pristine Annapurna ecosystem.

Authentic Connection

Your stay is an invitation to participate—be it through a farm tour, understanding local culture, or simply sharing stories by the fireplace.

Rustic Luxury

We define luxury not by extravagance, but by authenticity, comfort, and the profound peace that comes from being in a truly special place.
